abilities.name: Install
abilities.effect: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), move a Technical Machine card attached to 1 of your Pokémon to another of your Pokémon. This power can't be used if Porygon-Z is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Learning
attacks.effect: Search your deck for a Pokémon LV.X that levels up from 1 of your Pokémon and put it onto that Pokémon. (This counts as leveling up that Pokémon). Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Overload
attacks.effect: Does 40 damage plus 20 more damage for each Technical Machine card attached to Porygon-Z.
